autumn.lang

Interface Delegate

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Functor, TypedFunctor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDelegate, ModuleDelegate

    public interface Delegate
extends TypedFunctor
    An instance of this interface is a delegate.

    A delegate is a functor that simply invokes a function.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.reflect.Method method()
      This method retrieves the reflection of the method that is invoked by this delegate.
      Module module()
      This method retrieves the module that contains the delegated function.
      java.lang.String name()
      This method retrieves the name of the method that is invoked by this delegate.
      java.lang.Class owner()
      This method retrieves the type that owns the method that is invoked by this delegate.
      java.util.List<java.lang.Class> parameterTypes()
      This method retrieves the types of the functor's formal-parameters.
      java.lang.Class returnType()
      This method retrieves the return-type of the the method that is invoked by this delegate.

      • Methods inherited from interface autumn.lang.Functor

        apply

    • Method Detail

      • module

        Module module()
        This method retrieves the module that contains the delegated function.
        Returns:
        the module that contains the function that this delegate refers to.

      • owner

        java.lang.Class owner()
        This method retrieves the type that owns the method that is invoked by this delegate.
        Returns:
        the owner of the underlying method.

      • name

        java.lang.String name()
        This method retrieves the name of the method that is invoked by this delegate.
        Returns:
        the name of the underlying method.

      • returnType

        java.lang.Class returnType()
        This method retrieves the return-type of the the method that is invoked by this delegate.
        Specified by:
        returnType in interface TypedFunctor
        Returns:
        the return-type of the underlying method.

      • parameterTypes

        java.util.List<java.lang.Class> parameterTypes()
        This method retrieves the types of the functor's formal-parameters.
        Specified by:
        parameterTypes in interface TypedFunctor
        Returns:
        an immutable list of the formal-parameter's types.

      • method

        java.lang.reflect.Method method()
        This method retrieves the reflection of the method that is invoked by this delegate.

        Remember: functions are really just static methods in a class.

        Returns:
        the reflective view of the underlying method.
